pluggable.name: markUp
pluggable.author: The Habari Community
pluggable.description: Adds easy HTML, Markdown, BBCode, or Textile tag insertion to Habari's editor and optionally your FormUI comment form.

help.value: This plugin provides an easy UI based method of inserting and processing HTML, Markdown, BBCode and Textile tags in your Habari editor and optionally your FormUI based comment form.
